location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to John Wedderburn, Civil Auditor, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of instructions, dated 23 March 1824, concerning a new form for the submission of the annual list of Ruscans paid for by the Bushire Residency. It explains these will be adopted for the following year.
